Text: This is another rip from the Russian sources with not very good audio, right? Still waiting for an official bluray release on February 05, 2013.
This has the same Russian surround mix with just the center channel taken from an English dialog mix.  It's not a proper English 5.1 mix.
buena imagen, pero el audio no es 5.1 real. para verla en un sistema de audio 2.1 esta mal
Dialog is English but most written text throughout the movie (on books, written on walls, dates, etc) is Russian. Frustrating but not complaining; I watched this movie for free.
